title: Executive Order 5288-Commutation of Rations and Quarters to Enlisted Men
content: Executive Order No. 5256, approved January 3, 1930, is revoked.
Executive Order No. 4728, approved September 29, 1927, and Executive Order No. 5022, approved January 5, 1929, are restored to full force and effect.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5288-Commutation of Rations and Quarters to Enlisted Men Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372914
